name: DJ LoopMan
description:
Entry for LD47 - "Stuck In A Loop"

Want to make music but your hands only go  "boom boom"?

Enter DJ Loopman! Beat-em baddies up and put them in a  loop for some sweet sweet tunes.

the 2D Pixel art was purchased, The music and programming were done fully during the Jam.

Controls

  • WASD or Arrow Keys for Movement
  • Left Click  - Attack (Make Noise when you hit)
  • Right Click - Hold to record
